import React from 'react' import { products } from '../products' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' export default function ProductScreen() { const { id } = useParams() // dynamic params from URL const product = products.find((p) => p.id === id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}
) }
